list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an apparatus using or applying mechanical power and having several parts, each with a definite function and together performing a particular task.
(especially in manufacturing) make or operate on with a machine.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the cylinder covers are waiting to be machined
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các nắp xi lanh đang chờ để được gia công
